title: Remove Docs and Learn More sections from UI/navigation

requirements.text: Remove the Docs section from the primary navigation so users no longer see a "Docs" nav item in the header navigation or mobile drawer.

quotes: Can you also remove the docs section and learn more section

acceptanceCriteria: The header navigation no longer contains a link labeled "Docs".
The mobile navigation drawer no longer contains a link labeled "Docs".
No other navigation links (Home, Report Issue, My Reports, Official Dashboard, Escalated Issues) are removed or renamed as part of this change.

requirements.text: Remove the "Learn More" section/link from the landing page hero area so the landing page no longer displays a button or link that routes users to documentation.

quotes: Can you also remove the docs section and learn more section

acceptanceCriteria: The landing page hero no longer shows a button/link labeled "Learn More".
The remaining primary CTA in the hero (e.g., "Report an Issue" when authenticated or "Get Started" when not authenticated) still renders and works.

requirements.text: Remove the /docs route from the application routing so the documentation page is no longer accessible via in-app navigation routes.

quotes: Can you also remove the docs section and learn more section

acceptanceCriteria: The router no longer registers a route at path "/docs".
Navigating to "/docs" does not render the documentation content page (e.g., it should not resolve to the DocsPage component).

constraints: Frontend files under frontend/src/components/ui must not be edited; they must only be composed/used.
Do not modify any immutable hook entrypoints (frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts) or frontend/src/main.tsx.
Backend must remain single-actor; no backend changes are required for this request.
nonGoals: Do not change complaint workflows, escalation logic, priority scoring, or any backend data model.
Do not redesign the landing page beyond removing the specified Docs/Learn More UI elements.
Do not remove project documentation files from the repository unless required for build correctness; the goal is to remove the docs section from the website UI/navigation.
